-- | provides a backend implementation to aggregate traced values
--   
--   provides a backend implementation to aggregate traced values
@package lobemo-backend-aggregation
@version 0.1.0.3

module Cardano.BM.Backend.Aggregation
data Aggregation a
plugin :: (IsEffectuator s a, ToJSON a, FromJSON a) => Configuration -> Trace IO a -> s a -> IO (Plugin a)
instance Cardano.BM.Data.Backend.IsEffectuator Cardano.BM.Backend.Aggregation.Aggregation a
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON a => Cardano.BM.Data.Backend.IsBackend Cardano.BM.Backend.Aggregation.Aggregation a
